title: Substack notifies users about a "limited" data breach in October 2025, found on February 3 and now patched; a threat actor leaked a database of ~697K records (Sergiu Gatlan/BleepingComputer)
tags: BleepingComputer;Substack notifies users about a“limited” data breach in October 2025, found on February 3 and now patched; a threat actor leaked a database of ~697K records
